title: Ace Degenerate
desc: 34 years after losing the All Valley Karate Championship, Johnny Lawrence decides to reopen the Cobra Kai Dojo while his school adversary, Daniel LaRusso, runs a successful auto business.

title: Strike First
desc: Daniel is dismayed to find a new Cobra Kai dojo has been opened up. Johnny learns his dojo has to pass several safety requirements before he can actually start teaching.

title: Esqueleto
desc: Miguel helps Johnny advertise Cobra Kai on the web. Daniel agrees to chaperone at the Halloween dance so he can keep an eye on his daughter.

title: Cobra Kai Never Dies
desc: Robbie is in hot water with his father. Johnny plans to shut down Cobra Kai after Miguel is injured. Samantha and Kyler's relationship hits rock bottom. A vandalized billboard creates tension for Daniel.

title: Counterbalance
desc: Cobra Kai gains its second student. Daniel has an intricate plan to get payback on Johnny. Miguel defends Samantha against Kyler during lunch break.

title: Quiver
desc: Johnny's dojo class attracts a group of misfits while his son Robby, who harbors ulterior motives, lands a new job. Samantha makes a new friend in science class. Daniel inspires interest in karate from an unlikely person.

title: All Valley
desc: When Johnny learns Cobra Kai is banned from the All Valley Tournament, he faces the City Council. Miguel asks Samantha out. Robbie takes lessons from Daniel, just as his buddies plot a heist from LaRusso Auto.

title: Molting
desc: Johnny prepares his Cobra Kai students for the next All Valley Karate Tournament and in turn, he is inspired to clean up his life. Daniel is still unaware of his new pupil's background.

title: Different but Same
desc: Louie's reckless actions force Johnny and Daniel to go down memory lane. The Cobra Kai students plot revenge against the popular kids. Miguel grows impatient with Samantha.

title: Mercy
desc: It is the day of the 2018 All Valley Karate Tournament and Cobra Kai is determined to win. Robbie signs up unaffiliated. A familiar face from the past returns.

title: Mercy Part II
desc: In the aftermath of Cobra Kai's win at the Under 18 All Valley Karate Championships, Johnny questions his dojo's philosophy and deals with a figure from his past. Daniel searches for the right way to respond to Cobra Kai's dominance.

title: Back in Black
desc: Miyagi-Do is reopened, with Robbie and Samantha as Daniel's first students. Daniel and Amanda meet their quota at LaRusso Auto. Johnny lays down the law to stop his students goofing off.

title: Fire and Ice
desc: Daniel pulls out all the stops in an effort to recruit new students to Miyagi-Do Karate. Johnny reflects on some of the major relationships in his life and responds to Daniel's promotional efforts with his own.

title: The Moment of Truth
desc: Daniel struggles to teach a new student. Meanwhile, Cobra Kai students wage war on the Miyagi dojo.

title: All In
desc: Daniel struggles to help a new student learn. Miguel makes a new connection, while Johnny tries to repair a relationship. Tensions between the two dojos build to a breaking point.

title: Take a Right
desc: Johnny goes for a ride with some old friends. Kreese continues to exert his authority at Cobra Kai.

title: Lull
desc: To prepare his students, Daniel gives some new training methods a shot. Miguel puts a new lesson into practice. Johnny makes a tough but pivotal decision that affects Cobra Kai.

title: Glory of Love
desc: Daniel works to make amends with Amanda, while Johnny is introduced to the world of dating apps. Complications arise when Miguel, Samantha, Robby and Tory cross paths.

title: Pulpo
desc: Johnny cautiously takes a stab at love, while Daniel and Amanda enjoy a romantic date night. An attempt to bring the students of the two dojos together backfires as hostilities between the teens escalate.

title: No Mercy
desc: Tensions between the two dojos finally come to a head on the first day of school. The resulting showdown leaves one student fighting for their life.

title: Aftermath
desc: Miguel's fighting for his life, Robby's missing, and Daniel and Johnny's reputations are in tatters as the community reacts to the West Valley brawl.

title: Nature vs. Nurture
desc: Daniel and Johnny team up to find Robby. Miguel faces an uncertain future. Kreese tries to bring Tory back to Cobra Kai.

title: Now You're Gonna Pay
desc: Daniel's tarnished public image takes a toll on his sales, leading to a takeover offer. Johnny tries to raise money for Miguel's surgery.

title: The Right Path
desc: Following an important meeting in Japan, Daniel revisits Mr. Miyagi's hometown in Okinawa. Johnny attempts to reconnect with Robby.

title: Miyagi-Do
desc: In Okinawa, Daniel spends time with an old friend - and an old enemy, who has much to teach him. The dueling dojos' rivalry comes to a nasty head.

title: King Cobra
desc: Miguel helps Johnny craft the perfect social media message. Kreese scouts new recruits while Daniel and Amanda try to shut down Cobra Kai.

title: Obst√°culos
desc: Daniel spends some father-daughter time with a traumatized Sam, Johnny plans to form a new karate dojo but struggles to come up with a cool name.

title: The Good, The Bad, and the Badass
desc: Informed that this year's All Valley Karate Tournament is being canceled, the three competing sensei attend a city council meeting to save it.

title: Feel the Night
desc: It's Christmastime in the Valley, and romance is in the air. Daniel and Miguel find unexpected common ground, and the Cobra Kai recruits go on a mission.

title: December 19
desc: Old wounds begin to heal at a country club Christmas party, but a brutal assault by Kreese's students leads to new betrayals and alliances.

title: Let's Begin
desc: Miyagi-Do, Eagle Fang and Cobra Kai are training for the all valley karate tournament.

title: First Learn Stand
desc: Johnny picks up defensive strategies while Daniel learns to how to go on the offensive. Amanda confronts Tory. New kid Kenny is bullied at school.

title: Then Learn Fly
desc: Kenny tries to become a student of Cobra Kai with some encouragement from Robby, while Johnny urges Sam to take a leap of faith - in herself.

title: Bicephaly
desc: Kreese brings Terry back to Cobra Kai, but his former partner isn't interested repairing history. Johnny grows envious mentoring Miguel.

title: Match Point
desc: Johnny and Daniels dojo and their fragile alliance teeter on the brink of collapse when they agree to a winner takes all sensei showdown.

title: Kicks Get Chicks
desc: A major change to the upcoming tournament sends Johnny scrambling to find a new recruit for Eagle Fang. Tory must ask a favor of the LaRussos.

title: Minefields
desc: Daniel invites Anthony to join Miyagi-Do and discovers he doesn't know his son as well as he thought. Miguel learns about Johnny and Carmen's relationship.

title: Party Time
desc: Miguel and Sam are excited about attending the junior prom until another couple unexpectedly shows up. Terry lures Johnny to a familiar location.

title: The Fall
desc: The annual All Valley Karate Tournament kicks off as several competing dojos vie for the grand championship - and settle some personal scores.

title: The Rise
desc: The tournaments comes to a shocking end, with the aftermath leaving its participants reeling - and two champions facing uncertain futures.
